meanings.definition: Involving a process that repeats itself in a self-similar way.

meanings.sent3: The recursive nature of the maze made it both frustrating and intriguing.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were recursive, circling back to the same worries over and over.
meanings.sent5: The recursive melody of the song echoed in his mind long after it ended.
